creator: tech.support@donsdirectory.com
text:
On this page:

http://httpd.apache.org/docs/2.1/mod/mod_authnz_ldap.html

I notice two minor errors:

1.  The line showing the default setting says "AuthLDAPBindAuhtoritative".  Notice that the second "Auth" is spelt "Auht".

2.  The description says, "with the users credentials" -- it is missing the possessive apostrophe:  should read, "...with the user's credentials".
